script.title: atm.slax
script.author: phil
script.synopsis: Classifies interfaces by their vc numbers and places them into groups
script.description: We want to allocate bandwith to interfaces with more traffic. The script sets classifications based on vc numbers and adds bronze, sliver, or gold variables to each interface.
script.implementation: A connection with large traffic will want to organize its bandwith based on priority.
